## Double annotations

Load packages:

```{r}
library(bugphyzz)
library(taxPPro)
library(dplyr)
```

Import bugphyzz

```{r}
phys <- physiologies('aerophilicity')
aer <- filter(phys[[1]], Attribute_value == TRUE)

```

Get duplicates

```{r}
con <- getConflicts(aer)
agr <- getAgreements(aer)
dan <- getDoubleAnnotations(aer)
```

```{r}

table(dan$Rank)
```
